channel.title: Changing combat xp given...?
channel.description:
Sorry to sound new, but this is one of the few things I don't know how to do.
If someone would tell me what to search, and where, I'd appreciate it.
I'll reward you =-)

item.title: Changing combat xp given...?
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

this may or may not help…

in ur client sear for

addSkillXP

there is a few of them… look for the 1 ur wanting to change the xp on ull see something like *800 for example… and change that number to what u want…

sorry if this is not what ur wanting.

this is what i used for attack dummys ect. so to make it fast if ur wanting to change the xp on attack dummys search for
[code]you attack the dummy[/code] and right under it once again ull see the *1800 change that number.

Read full topic
